project.description: Builds Kubernetes Charm and executes bundle tests

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: set +x echo "==================================================" echo " Charm build phase" echo "==================================================" echo "" echo "" set -x docker run --rm -v $PWD:/kubernetes -w /kubernetes/cluster/juju/layers/kubernetes \ jujusolutions/charmbox:latest \ /usr/bin/charm build -s xenial --no-local-layers -o /kubernetes

set +x echo "==================================================" echo " Test image build phase" echo "==================================================" echo "" echo "" set -x
mkdir -p Builder && \ cd Builder && \
cp $ENV_YAML environments.yaml
cat << EOF > Dockerfile FROM jujusolutions/charmbox:latest ADD ./environments.yaml /home/ubuntu/environments.yaml RUN chown -R ubuntu:ubuntu /home/ubuntu/.juju EOF
docker build -t gce-charmbox .
cd .. rm -rf Builder

set +x echo "==================================================" echo " Bootstrap & charm test phase" echo "==================================================" echo "" echo "" set -x set +e docker run -u ubuntu -w /home/ubuntu --rm -v $PWD/xenial:/home/ubuntu/xenial gce-charmbox /bin/bash -c " sudo chown -R ubuntu:ubuntu .juju && \ sudo chown ubuntu:ubuntu environments.yaml && \ mv environments.yaml .juju/environments.yaml && \ juju switch gce && \ cd /home/ubuntu/xenial/kubernetes && \ /usr/local/bin/bundletester -F -l DEBUG -v "

set +x echo "==================================================" echo " Cleanup with a hammer phase" echo "==================================================" echo "" echo "" sleep 3 set +e docker rm $(docker ps -aq) docker rmi gce-charmbox
